description: Tumor invades lamina propria or submucosa (stomach)
Tumor penetrates serosa (visceral peritoneum) without invasion of adjacent structures (stomach)
Metastasis in 1 to 6 regional (perigastric) lymph nodes (stomach)
Metastasis in 7 to 15 regional (perigastric) lymph nodes (stomach)
Metastasis in more than 15 regional (perigastric) lymph nodes (stomach)
